helpText: ķ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ū.

generic.title: ķ_Error updating categories__________________________ū
generic.message: ķ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ū.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ķ_Error updating categories__________________________ū
maxDepthExceeded.message: ķ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ū.

destinationHasSameName.title: ķ_Error updating categories__________________________ū
destinationHasSameName.message: ķ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ū.

noSchema.title: ķ_Schema not found_________________ū
noSchema.message: ķ_Item schema not found for user_________________ū.

maxCharacter.title: ķ_Error updating categories__________________________ū
maxCharacter.message: ķ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ū.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ķ_Delete category________________ū
deleteInUseCategory.message: ķ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ū.

custom.title: ķ_Custom categories__________________ū
custom.message: ķ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ū.

arcgis.title: ķ_ArcGIS categories__________________ū
arcgis.message: ķ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ū.

iso.title: ķ_ISO categories_______________ū
iso.message: ķ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ū.

inspire.title: ķ_INSPIRE categories___________________ū
inspire.message: ķ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ū.
